name: Voodoo Love
description:
Voodoo Love: a game about fixing what was once broken.

You are a collector of broken, evil Voodoo Dolls, sworn to nurture them back to health, with love and kindness. Tap your screen to heal your wounded Dolls, help their souls find peace, but don’t let them turn to the dark side. Upgrade your tools, to heal them faster.
